question:
Which statement best describes a deterministic algorithm?
A) It may produce different outputs for the same input
B) It relies on random sampling
C) It always produces the same output for the same input
D) It requires a learning phase
correct_option_text: It always produces the same output for the same input

Which situation violates referential transparency?
